name: Slash Journey
description:
An Adventure awaits

 

You are an Collector who likes cool things, you have collected every rare thing in the world, except for one; The golden sword said to be able to Pierce any armour.

But getting there won't be easy, it's guarded by The Corrupted, people who tried to take the sword but died doing so, in process becoming zombie like yet very alive. Use your sword to slash through the corrupted and get to the Golden sword.

W A S D to move

Mouse 1(left mouse button) to attack

Scroll to choose another weapon

This isn't a complete game, it's just a small project I started with, which I plan on developing more and releasing after I hear from the community
